buffs.description: Increases Human Tribe Friendliness. 40 for every 5-star and 80 for every 6-star. Effects are applied even when the unit is in Time Shop. The Tribe Friendliness increased by the Fire Ranger cannot exceed 1,000.
buffs.name: Tribe Friendliness (Human)

hidden_abilites: At its first appearance, it increases the attack speed and movement speed of all ally units, and casts a shield that temporarily grants immunity against magical attacks.
Increases its movement speed by 10%, and its attack speed by 10%.
Increases the movement speed and the attack range of all units by 6%, and the critical damage of all units by 5%.
Significantly increases attack power and critical hit rate against enemy crystal.
Tribe Friendliness for Human can be increased up to 1,500 by Fire Ranger.

Increase Efficiency for Token Enhancement (Human): The efficiency for Token Enhancement (Human) is increased. Increase Tribe Friendliness by 40 for each 5-star, 100 for each 6-star. Effects are applied even when in Time Shop.
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Fire Ranger ]
